attributes.additional_details: Its not fair on young people my sisters couldnt even book lessons or practical in 2020 due to lockdown and then when she did her practical got cancelled three times twice because  examiners had covid 19 and once thanks to national lockdown once again.
attributes.background:
Extend theory test expire dates as people
 aren not able to book lessons or practicals if that cannot be done they should be refunded their theory test money

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558160
